Aevi Oil-free Face Serum

Brand: Aevi

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Water (Aqua), Glycerin (Vegetable), Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp (Snow Mushroom) Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Fu

) Flower Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus (Sea Oak Seaweed) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
